data.name: ReadCase1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, INFO_REQUEST_NO from CKT_CASE where INFO_REQUEST_NO = @infoRequestNo

data.name: ReadCase2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, INFO_REQUEST_NO from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInformationRequest
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, APPL_PROC_IND, FK_CKT_CASENUMB from CKT_INFO_REQ where NUMB = @numb
